13 Indiana University Boots Woke Lecturer for Labeling MAGA ‘White Supremacy’ in Classroom Rant (www.thegatewaypundit.com) SAVE AMERICA posted 3 hours ago by Trick 1 comments award share report block Indiana University Boots Woke Lecturer for Labeling MAGA 'White Supremacy' in Classroom Rant | The Gateway Pundit | by Cassandra... Indiana University has yanked a far-left lecturer from her “Diversity, Human Rights, and Social Justice” course after she branded the MAGA movement as “covert white supremacy” during a class presentation. www.thegatewaypundit.com
